storyInfo: In the abandoned factory-turned-temporary detention center, Heidi notices the Sarkaz mercenaries are acting strangely. Under the Doctor's command, Amiya's team and the Self-Salvation Corps have successfully infiltrated the abandoned factory.

attributes.content: 7:17 P.M. \ Overcast
Abandoned Liquor Plant, Sudean Borough, Londinium
Get moving! Don't just stand there! Get a move on!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The general said we gotta be done with these materials tonight and get them sent to the station!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Ungh...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: What are you crying for? You slacking off?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Ahh... P-Please don't hit me... I haven't slept for three or four days now... I'm really tired... Agh!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Stop it.
Who are you, and what gives you the right to stop me?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Lady Heidi...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Don't worry, just get behind me.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I see. You're the new girl who just got here a couple days ago. You're... a teacher? A journalist?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Whatever, don't remember exactly, but you're one of those good-for-nothing scumbags. A dime a dozen in Victoria.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Save the smooth talk for the rich and noble. It doesn't work on us Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... *cough*.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Y-You're bleeding!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: If you want to kill me and my friends, then do it, but don't forget that there are some hundred pairs of eyes staring at you right now.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: What are you all looking at?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: They want to see how you're going to deal with me.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: You think we'd be scared of a bunch of prisoners?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Of course not, but work waits for no one. Isn't that right? You said it yourself. Your general wants these materials done tonight.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Heh, maybe seeing how you two is about to end up will motivate them some.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: If they figure out what awaits them tomorrow morning, do you think they'll still willingly spend their last night on Terra forging weapons for their enemies?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: You...! How'd you know that tomorrow...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I also happen to know why you must let us live through the night.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Hey, she's taunting you. Don't be a moron and spill all the beans. Let's get going. We have work to do too.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I don't take orders from you!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: That change of clothes really helped your temper, huh? Remember who was crying for his mother when he was fighting the Victorian remnants not all that long ago.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Piss off, you loudmouthed merc. Your head's gonna roll one day because of that tongue of yours.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You'll have that jerk who's been yelling about everything in my ears to thank. Trust me, I didn't use to talk like this.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm too busy to be wasting time on you morons. Fine, I'll let these people live a couple hours longer.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: All of you... and you in particular. No funny moves.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Listen up! The Sarkaz got no tolerance for slackers! Anyone who's not working wins a date with our blades! Got it?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Now get to work, if you know what's good for you!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We're safe for the time being.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I-I'm sorry, Lady Heidi. You got hurt because of me...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: I'm fine. Just got my dress dirty.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: You're always so calm and graceful... It puts my mind at ease just knowing you're here with us.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Then trust me once more, alright?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Go back inside and stay with your friends. The Sarkaz still need you to do their work. They won't hurt us, for the time being.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: As for these mercenaries...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: We'd better stop watching. We got work to do tonight, right?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: Come on, no buts. Hoederer told us to come and do whatever the soldiers say.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: Okay, stop staring at the wall. This place is the farthest from the entrance. Not even a bug could fly in here. Look here—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: —See how sturdy it is? Let's go.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: 7:27 P.M. \ Overcast
Underground structure, Sudean Borough, Londinium
Forward! Forward!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Report, Commander! The 3rd is all ready! Confirming Exit No. 9 clear—
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Confirmed! We can exit safely!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Rockrock, what are you doing here? You're still wounded...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Captain, permission to rejoin the team?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But the commander said...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: They have Bill. He covered me... and I can't just lie down here when I don't even know if he's still alive.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I will rescue him, Rockrock. I promise.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You might think I'm not a suitable leader...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: If he was here, he would say that you are.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: He always believed in you. We all believe in you.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You do...?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But this mission isn't like the covert rescue operations before.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We might run into a bunch of Sarkaz warriors head on and find ourselves in unprecedented danger.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rockrock, before you joined the Self-Salvation Corps, you were just the daughter of a train stoker who'd only graduated secondary school.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You're just a mechanic yourself.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Haha, that's true.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The Sarkaz call us rebels... Does that really make us an army, though? We're just normal Londiniers.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You're absolutely right. I'm very normal.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I never remember all the righteous talk the commander preaches. The only thing on my mind is how to keep my family alive.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Feist, I'm actually really afraid of the Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But I'm more afraid of you dying somewhere when I'm not looking!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I know, Rockrock... I'm afraid too. I'm afraid of dying, and I'm even more afraid I could get the rest of you killed.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Phew... Haha.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It feels much better getting it off your chest, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Now, let's go.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Indra and I will guard this place with the Self-Salvation Corps. Dagda and Morgan are rendezvousing with Amiya.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: It's not often you split up.;Did something happen?

attributes.content: There's no hiding anything from you, is there?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's nothing important. There are just certain things that we have to deal with sooner or later, and we needed a suitable time for them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: It's hard to push forward with expectations on your shoulders.;Need me to say anything to them?

attributes.content: Are you all ready?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: You've just arrived at the exit closest to the objective. From here to the factory, we'll have to cross two underground blocks.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Our squads are in position. They will make sure our trip to the objective goes smoothly.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I will leave you in command for the rest, Dr.{@nickname}.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Clovisia is a capable leader, and everyone has expectations of her and Amiya.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Doctor, There's been a lot on my mind throughout this journey, but there is still one thing that I haven't entirely thought through.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If there is one thing I have to take care of myself, this is it. If I can't even keep my closest friends in check, then what's the point of coming back here?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Doctor, we got a transmission from Feist. They've made it aboveground already. We need to rendezvous with them right away—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: It's time for us to leave.;Let's enjoy the Londinium air.

attributes.content: Right, we'll be ready.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Haha... I would like to know, too.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I wish you... a safe journey.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: 7:55 P.M. \ Overcast
Outside the Eastern Entrance, Abandoned Liquor Plant, Sudean Borough, Londinium
Blake, give me a report of the situation up ahead.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The path is clear, over.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Robben?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Sniper team is in position.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Good. How many hostiles?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I got twelve in sight. All of them Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: What about their commander? Do you see him?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I don't.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Stay frosty. Wait for my signal.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: 8:09 P.M. \ Overcast
Abandoned Liquor Plant, Sudean Borough, Londinium
Aaah... ah...
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Ha... Haah... ah...
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Benny, who's in that room?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Uh... the Self-Salvation Corps soldier they captured this afternoon.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Are they interrogating him?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: The Sarkaz won't let the chance to get some Self-Salvation Corps intel slip away. That soldier... probably doesn't have much longer to live.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: I hope he'll hang in there for a little longer. It won't be much longer now...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Are they here...?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: No signs of anyone yet.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Then stay on the lookout.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: How's Hoederer's search going?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The mercenaries are watching our prisoners in the cells. They've been working all day, but we have too many prisoners. It'll take time to check each one of them.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What's more, this guy we have in here is a stubborn one. We haven't managed to beat anything out of him...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hm... Make good use of what time we have left, then. If he still doesn't give us anything...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Is it my time to shine, then?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Ugh—You, you...!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Put your blade down.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General! How did he...?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Wait outside. I will take care of this.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes... Please be careful!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'm sure you know that even if he actually tried to attack us, that blade wouldn't have done him much good.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Please... I would rather you stop startling my men. They're all fairly anxious as is.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Very well. We just didn't want to be late. Especially considering the guy inside isn't even breathing anymore.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: You came at just the right moment, then.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Who's in charge of the south side of the factory?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Schwab's squad, Captain.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Schwab, huh...? He was in my squad five years ago.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Is that what you meant when you said I should pay attention to the shadows beneath my feet?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Get ahold of Schwab's position. No, have him come see me right now.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Benny, it's a little quiet outside the building, isn't it? Where are the mercenaries guarding the place? Are they gone?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Right, not one of them's still here.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: They are acting quite strange...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: They were strange to start with, no? The Sarkaz never made any sense, whether making friends or killing.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Don't say that unless you're trying to anger them.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Sorry, Lady Heidi... but I've been locked in here for two weeks. It's hard for me not to hate the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: No one blames you. You're doing very well.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Right, I heard the Sarkaz general paid us a visit at noon, with the mercenary leader.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Manfred did...?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Manfred... that's not good.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: This is a trap. Clovisia... and maybe them...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Are you worried that the commander will start the operation tonight? We need to find a way to get in touch with them... Uh... but it's been so many days, and we still haven't found a way to get any news past these walls.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: No, I'm sure they've considered that this could be a trap. This might perhaps... be an opportunity too.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Benny, let everyone know that our operation might need to be pushed up. Anyone who can fight should get ready to fight.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: But even if we can make it out of the factory building, it won't be easy to push through all the defenses outside the gate...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Then let's come this way.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: A mercenary told me this wall here... is very safe.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: 8:45 P.M. \ Overcast
Outside the South Wall of the Abandoned Liquor Plant, Sudean Borough, Londinium
Higher... A little higher... Yep, this is a nice view, stable and all.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure, what do you see?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm... Three entrances. Each of 'em have some thirty men standing guard.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The ones guarding the entrance to the east are all Sarkaz. So are the ones to the southwest, actually... Uh, different outfits, though. Looks like they might be mercs.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: And there's the main entrance to the north... It's the Dublinn forces who're guarding that one.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Then there are also some five or six squads patrolling the campus, going about between each factory building...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh? Wait up... The south... like, the wall closest to us... This place's empty.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Empty?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Going by how things are laid out everywhere else, there should be a squad patrolling here, too... but there doesn't seem to be one.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Might be a trap.;Perhaps we have a helping hand.

attributes.content: Doctor, should we proceed as planned?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We need to rescue Lady Heidi, and we also need to get to Central Londinium as soon as possible... No matter the case, we don't have any time to waste.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We'll do as you say in this operation. Commander's orders.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: We have someone to rescue too.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Doctor, I was going to say that no matter what your call is, we've got our operation... but my brothers in the 3rd are right. You're the commander.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: Team Morgan, to the east entrance.;The 3rd will split up and distract the north and southwest entrances.;Closure will stay on surveillance and support.

attributes.content: Alright, Doctor. Dagda, let's go.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Roger that. Let's move!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: No problem. Leave it to me.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Amiya, send a signal to the others.

attributes.content: Others? Are there other Rhodes Islanders aboveground?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Right, Mr. Feist. As soon as they get our signal, they'll know that we'll have an operation here tonight.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you see them, Doctor? I'm guessing not yet, right? They aren't close enough.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You said they aren't nearby? Uh, does the Doctor have some kind of special Arts?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: No, PRTS is helping me.;I've got X-ray vision.

attributes.content: What... That sounds like some amazing technology.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Doctor, you have to tell me more about it once we get back.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Doctor, you aren't pulling my leg, are you?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You have to have some kind of special terminal. The kinds with displays and all!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But if someone is here, should we wait outside?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No need. If they determine there's a need to rendezvous with us, it'll be after we head inside.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then the problem at hand is still how we get inside...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Doctor, it's your call. Which way?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That's a wall...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah! I get it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Closure, Mr. Feist, do you have any way for us to climb over there?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We could blow it up? We made a buncha new demolition devices. Couldn't have blown Londinium's outer walls, but they could work here.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Uh... it might be difficult.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Londinium's factories are usually built with reinforced outer walls. Unless you blow it up from the inside, it probably won't have as much of an effect as you'd expect.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Then... How about if I pack in some more firepower?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No, that'll attract too much attention. Morgan's efforts will go to waste.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Alright... I guess we should've had Morgan take some with her.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: How about we use grappling hooks? Rockrock and I use them sometimes to hide from the patrols.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Johnny, bring the stuff over here.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You got it, Captain. I almost thought I was carrying it for nothing.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Preparedness averts peril.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I need Rock-5 to mark the position...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Oh, right, I almost forgot. Here!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Is this... Rock-17? Why do you have it?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Because I was working on it the whole time on our way up! Look, it's all done. It's got Closure's Seal of Quality on it!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Uh... I'm not sure my Seal of Quality is any good to you, though...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I checked it out. It's running well.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What's this ear?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I added it while I was at it! All Closure brand drones get one!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Crap... You don't like it? If you don't like it...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No, no need to fix it.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Nothing wrong with the drone, then? I'll take the Doctor, Johnny, and Gabby with me. Rockrock... Can you take Amiya with you?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I'll launch the device, then—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rock-17, aim!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Anchor secured!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Let's do this, Miss Rockrock.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hold tight, Doctor. The wall isn't that tall, but they call these things ziplines for a reason.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: So I'm not getting out of this, huh?;......;When do I get to be master of my own fate?

attributes.content: Alright... Are we all ready?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This might be our only chance—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 3, 2, 1—Launch!
attributes.name: Amiya
